title: MISCELLANEOUS
description: General commands, you get the idea

commands.name: info
commands.description: Learn about the bot. :)

commands.name: help
commands.description: Alias for /info

commands.name: ping
commands.description: "Pings" DILF

commands.name: game <new-game>
commands.description: Set's DILF's playing status. Only allowed once per hour.

commands.name: topster <lastfm-user> [background-color] [text-color] [title] [period] [show-titles] [show-numbers]
commands.description: Create a 3x3 Topster chart using Last.fm data

commands.name: jerkcity episode <number>
commands.description: Fetches an episode of Jerkcity by its number

commands.name: jerkcity latest
commands.description: Fetches the latest episode of Jerkcity

commands.name: jerkcity random
commands.description: Fetches a random episode of Jerkcity

commands.name: jerkcity search <query>
commands.description: Searches the Jerkcity API for the given query

commands.name: q [user] [index]
commands.description: Query a guild quote. Quotes are added by reacting to messages with ðŸ’¬

commands.name: quote delete <index>
commands.description: Delete a quote. Must have manage server permission, be the author of the message, or the user that added the quote

commands.name: quote list
commands.description: Get the guild's list of quotes

title: PROFILE
description: User command pertaining to user profiles

commands.name: profile init
commands.description: Create your profile

commands.name: profile delete <are-you-sure>
commands.description: Delete your profile

commands.name: profile get
commands.description: Get a link to your profile on the site

commands.name: profile set-timezone <timezone>
commands.description: Set your timezone

commands.name: tag <name>
commands.description: Query a tag

title: TAGS
description: User commands pertaining to tags, AKA custom commands. These are not global, rather being specific to the current guild.

commands.name: tags create <name> <content>
commands.description: Create a tag

commands.name: tags update <name> <content>
commands.description: Update a tag. Limited to the user that created the tag or users with the MANAGE_MESSAGES permission

commands.name: tags rename <name> <new-name>
commands.description: Rename a tag. Limited to the user that created the tag or users with the MANAGE_MESSAGES permission

commands.name: tags delete <name>
commands.description: Delete a tag. Limited to the user that created the tag or users with the MANAGE_MESSAGES permission

commands.name: tags list
commands.description: Link to the guild tag list on the website

title: ROLE
description: User commands pertaining to vanity roles, AKA self-assignable roles. These replace the pronoun commands found in previous iterations of the bot. Roles must be created or imported by a guild administrator before being assignable

commands.name: role add <role>
commands.description: Add a vanity role to yourself

commands.name: role remove <role>
commands.description: Remove a vanity role from yourself

commands.name: role list
commands.description: List all the vanity roles being managed by the bot

title: ROLES
description: Moderator commands pertaining to vanity roles; under their own command because Discord sucks donkey balls. These commands require you to have the manage roles permission on the guild

commands.name: roles create <name> [hex]
commands.description: Create a new Discord role with the given settings and add it to the database

commands.name: roles delete <name>
commands.description: Delete a role from the guild and database.

commands.name: roles rename <new-name>
commands.description: Rename a role. Kind of self-explanatory

commands.name: roles setcolor <role> <color>
commands.description: Update a role's color

commands.name: roles import <one> [two] [three] [four] [five]
commands.description: Import up to 5 existing roles into the database

commands.name: roles relinquish <one> [two] [three] [four] [five]
commands.description: Remove up to 5 roles from the database

commands.name: roles fix
commands.description: Add role names to existing roles in the database; only necessary for guilds using the bot prior to the website update. Exists due to an oversight. Oopsie

title: SETTINGS
description: Moderator commands for configuring guild settings

commands.name: settings quotes set-min-required <minimum>
commands.description: Set the minimum number of reactions needed to quote a message

commands.name: settings quotes toggle <toggled>
commands.description: Toggle use of quote functionality

title: TIME
description: User commands for time convenience functionality

commands.name: time in [timezone]
commands.description: Displays the time in the given timezone. Optionally uses the timezone on your configured profile

commands.name: time stamp <time> [timezone] [format]
commands.description: Get a Discord timestamp for the given time. Accepts natural language. Uses your profile timezone, or whatever's given. Accepted formats are t, T, d, D, f, F, R

title: EGORAPTOR
description: Moderator commands for configuring the unfortunate egoraptor functionality. **SCROTEGANG only**

commands.name: egoraptor toggle <toggled>
commands.description: Toggle timing users out when they mention egoraptor eating pussy. Requires manage guild permissions

commands.name: egoraptor settimeout <seconds>
commands.description: Sets the length of an egoraptor-related timeout. Requires manage guild permissions

title: METTIC
description: Moderator commands for configuring Mettic's role updater. **SCROTEGANG only**

commands.name: mettic toggle <toggled>
commands.description: Toggle Mettic's role updater. Requires manage guild permissions
